More information about education benefits offered by VA is available at the official U.S. government website at https://www.benefits.va.gov/gibill/ .      Forms        GI Bill® Benefit Form  This form needs to be completed once every academic term          Post 9/11 Agreement Form  Only to be completed by students using the Post 9/11 GI Bill®, this form needs to be completed every semester          Forms        Academic Advisor Form  This form needs to be completed by students planning to use their GI Bill®          GI Bill® To Do list               LAS Online Pathways  Are you still on active duty but will be leaving the military soon? UIC’s Liberal Arts and Sciences Online Pathways program is a great option for students looking at completing general education courses in an online format. They are affordable and can satisfy program requirements at UIC.
